summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Spark creative assistant app. Backend APIs fully functional with GPT-5.2 integration working. Frontend UI and navigation working well. AI generation takes 20+ seconds which is normal for GPT-5.2 model.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - still properly blocks unauthorized access

integration_issues.issue: AI generation takes 20+ seconds, may appear to users as if it's not working
integration_issues.note: This is expected behavior for GPT-5.2 model but could benefit from better user feedback

passed_tests: Landing page loads with all 6 creative categories
Theme toggle works on all pages (landing, auth, dashboard, settings)
Dashboard displays after login with all categories
AI creative suggestion generation - /api/creative/generate endpoint (working but slow)
Settings page with theme toggle and logout
Protected routes redirect to auth when not logged in
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider adding better user feedback for AI generation (progress indicator, estimated time) since GPT-5.2 takes 20+ seconds to respond. All core functionality is working correctly.
